# Right ideals generated by subsets of rings

```agda
module ring-theory.right-ideals-generated-by-subsets-ringsᵉ where
```

</details>

## Idea

Theᵉ **rightᵉ idealᵉ generatedᵉ byᵉ aᵉ [subset](ring-theory.subsets-rings.md)**ᵉ `S`ᵉ ofᵉ
aᵉ [ring](ring-theory.rings.mdᵉ) `R`ᵉ isᵉ theᵉ leastᵉ rightᵉ idealᵉ in `R`ᵉ containingᵉ
`S`.ᵉ

## Definitions

### The universal property of right ideals generated by a subset of a ring

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) (Sᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Rᵉ)
  (Iᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ) (Hᵉ : Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ)
  where

  is-right-ideal-generated-by-subset-Ringᵉ : UUωᵉ
  is-right-ideal-generated-by-subset-Ringᵉ =
    {lᵉ : Level} (Jᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ lᵉ Rᵉ) → Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ →
    subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ
```

### The universal property of right ideals generated by a family of subsets of a ring

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ l4ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) {Uᵉ : UUᵉ l2ᵉ} (Sᵉ : Uᵉ → subset-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ)
  (Iᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ l4ᵉ Rᵉ) (Hᵉ : (αᵉ : Uᵉ) → Sᵉ αᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ)
  where

  is-right-ideal-generated-by-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ : UUωᵉ
  is-right-ideal-generated-by-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ =
    {lᵉ : Level} (Jᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ lᵉ Rᵉ) →
    ((αᵉ : Uᵉ) → Sᵉ αᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ) →
    leq-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ Jᵉ
```

### The universal property of right ideals generated by a famiy of elements of a ring

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) {Uᵉ : UUᵉ l2ᵉ} (aᵉ : Uᵉ → type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
  (Iᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ) (Hᵉ : (αᵉ : Uᵉ) → is-in-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ (aᵉ αᵉ))
  where

  is-right-ideal-generated-by-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ : UUωᵉ
  is-right-ideal-generated-by-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ =
    {lᵉ : Level} (Jᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ lᵉ Rᵉ) →
    ((αᵉ : Uᵉ) → is-in-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ (aᵉ αᵉ)) →
    leq-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ Jᵉ
```

### Construction of right ideals generated by a subset of a ring

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) (Sᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Rᵉ)
  where

  right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ : UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ)
  right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ =
    listᵉ (type-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ ×ᵉ type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)

  ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ :
    right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ → type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
  ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ nilᵉ = zero-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
  ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ (consᵉ (pairᵉ sᵉ rᵉ) lᵉ) =
    add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (inclusion-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ sᵉ) rᵉ)
      ( ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ lᵉ)

  preserves-concat-ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ :
    (uᵉ vᵉ : right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ) →
    ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ (concat-listᵉ uᵉ vᵉ) ＝ᵉ
    add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ)
      ( ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ vᵉ)
  preserves-concat-ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ nilᵉ vᵉ =
    invᵉ (left-unit-law-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ vᵉ))
  preserves-concat-ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ
    ( consᵉ (pairᵉ sᵉ rᵉ) uᵉ) vᵉ =
    ( apᵉ
      ( add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (inclusion-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ sᵉ) rᵉ))
      ( preserves-concat-ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ vᵉ)) ∙ᵉ
    ( invᵉ
      ( associative-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
        ( mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (inclusion-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ sᵉ) rᵉ)
        ( ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ)
        ( ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ vᵉ)))

  mul-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ :
    right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ →
    type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ → right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ
  mul-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ lᵉ rᵉ =
    map-listᵉ (λ (xᵉ ,ᵉ yᵉ) → (xᵉ ,ᵉ (mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ yᵉ rᵉ))) lᵉ

  preserves-mul-ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ :
    (uᵉ : right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ) (rᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) →
    ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ
      ( mul-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ rᵉ) ＝ᵉ
    mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ) rᵉ
  preserves-mul-ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ nilᵉ rᵉ =
    invᵉ (left-zero-law-mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ)
  preserves-mul-ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ (consᵉ (xᵉ ,ᵉ sᵉ) uᵉ) rᵉ =
    ( ap-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( invᵉ (associative-mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (inclusion-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ xᵉ) sᵉ rᵉ))
      ( preserves-mul-ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ rᵉ)) ∙ᵉ
    ( invᵉ
      ( right-distributive-mul-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
        ( mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (inclusion-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ xᵉ) sᵉ)
        ( ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ uᵉ)
        ( rᵉ)))

  subset-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ → UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ)
  subset-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ =
    fiberᵉ ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ

  subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ) Rᵉ
  subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ =
    trunc-Propᵉ (subset-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ)

  is-in-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ → UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ)
  is-in-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ = is-in-subtypeᵉ subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ

  contains-zero-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    contains-zero-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  contains-zero-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ = unit-trunc-Propᵉ (pairᵉ nilᵉ reflᵉ)

  is-closed-under-addition-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ :
    (xᵉ yᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) →
    subset-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ → subset-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ yᵉ →
    subset-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ (add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ xᵉ yᵉ)
  pr1ᵉ
    ( is-closed-under-addition-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ yᵉ (lᵉ ,ᵉ pᵉ) (kᵉ ,ᵉ qᵉ)) =
    concat-listᵉ lᵉ kᵉ
  pr2ᵉ
    ( is-closed-under-addition-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ yᵉ (lᵉ ,ᵉ pᵉ) (kᵉ ,ᵉ qᵉ)) =
    ( preserves-concat-ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ lᵉ kᵉ) ∙ᵉ
    ( ap-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ pᵉ qᵉ)

  is-closed-under-addition-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    is-closed-under-addition-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  is-closed-under-addition-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ {xᵉ} {yᵉ} Hᵉ Kᵉ =
    apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ Hᵉ
      ( subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ xᵉ yᵉ))
      ( λ H'ᵉ →
        apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ Kᵉ
          ( subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ xᵉ yᵉ))
          ( λ K'ᵉ →
            unit-trunc-Propᵉ
              ( is-closed-under-addition-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ yᵉ H'ᵉ K'ᵉ)))

  is-closed-under-right-multiplication-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ :
    (xᵉ rᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) → subset-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ →
    subset-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ (mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ xᵉ rᵉ)
  pr1ᵉ
    ( is-closed-under-right-multiplication-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ rᵉ
      ( pairᵉ lᵉ pᵉ)) =
    mul-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ lᵉ rᵉ
  pr2ᵉ
    ( is-closed-under-right-multiplication-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ rᵉ
      ( pairᵉ lᵉ pᵉ)) =
    ( preserves-mul-ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ lᵉ rᵉ) ∙ᵉ
    ( apᵉ (mul-Ring'ᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ) pᵉ)

  is-closed-under-right-multiplication-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    is-closed-under-right-multiplication-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  is-closed-under-right-multiplication-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ rᵉ Hᵉ =
    apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ Hᵉ
      ( subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ xᵉ rᵉ))
      ( λ H'ᵉ →
        unit-trunc-Propᵉ
          ( is-closed-under-right-multiplication-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ
            xᵉ rᵉ H'ᵉ))

  is-closed-under-negatives-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    is-closed-under-negatives-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  is-closed-under-negatives-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ {xᵉ} Hᵉ =
    trᵉ
      ( type-Propᵉ ∘ᵉ subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ)
      ( mul-neg-one-Ring'ᵉ Rᵉ xᵉ)
      ( is-closed-under-right-multiplication-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
        ( xᵉ)
        ( neg-one-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
        ( Hᵉ))

  right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ) Rᵉ
  pr1ᵉ right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ =
    subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  pr1ᵉ (pr1ᵉ (pr2ᵉ right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ)) =
    contains-zero-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  pr1ᵉ (pr2ᵉ (pr1ᵉ (pr2ᵉ right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ))) =
    is-closed-under-addition-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  pr2ᵉ (pr2ᵉ (pr1ᵉ (pr2ᵉ right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ))) =
    is-closed-under-negatives-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  pr2ᵉ (pr2ᵉ right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ) =
    is-closed-under-right-multiplication-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ

  contains-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
  contains-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ sᵉ Hᵉ =
    unit-trunc-Propᵉ
      ( ( consᵉ ((sᵉ ,ᵉ Hᵉ) ,ᵉ one-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) nilᵉ) ,ᵉ
        ( ( right-unit-law-add-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ sᵉ (one-Ringᵉ Rᵉ))) ∙ᵉ
          ( right-unit-law-mul-Ringᵉ Rᵉ sᵉ)))

  contains-right-formal-combinations-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    {l3ᵉ : Level} (Iᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ) → Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ →
    (xᵉ : right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ) →
    is-in-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ (ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ)
  contains-right-formal-combinations-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Iᵉ Hᵉ nilᵉ =
    contains-zero-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ
  contains-right-formal-combinations-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Iᵉ Hᵉ
    ( consᵉ (pairᵉ (pairᵉ sᵉ Kᵉ) rᵉ) cᵉ) =
    is-closed-under-addition-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ
      ( is-closed-under-right-multiplication-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ sᵉ rᵉ (Hᵉ sᵉ Kᵉ))
      ( contains-right-formal-combinations-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Iᵉ Hᵉ cᵉ)

  is-right-ideal-generated-by-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    is-right-ideal-generated-by-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ
      ( right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ)
      ( contains-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ)
  is-right-ideal-generated-by-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Jᵉ Kᵉ xᵉ Hᵉ =
    apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ Hᵉ (subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ xᵉ) Pᵉ
    where
    Pᵉ : subset-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ xᵉ → is-in-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ xᵉ
    Pᵉ (pairᵉ cᵉ reflᵉ) =
      contains-right-formal-combinations-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Jᵉ Kᵉ cᵉ

  is-closed-under-eq-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    {xᵉ yᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ} → is-in-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ →
    (xᵉ ＝ᵉ yᵉ) → is-in-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ yᵉ
  is-closed-under-eq-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ =
    is-closed-under-eq-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ

  is-closed-under-eq-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ :
    {xᵉ yᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ} → is-in-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ yᵉ →
    (xᵉ ＝ᵉ yᵉ) → is-in-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ
  is-closed-under-eq-right-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ =
    is-closed-under-eq-right-ideal-Ring'ᵉ Rᵉ right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
```

#### The subset relation is preserved by generating right ideals

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ : Level} (Aᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ)
  where

  preserves-order-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    {l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Sᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Aᵉ) (Tᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Aᵉ) →
    Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ Tᵉ →
    leq-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
      ( right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ)
      ( right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Tᵉ)
  preserves-order-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Sᵉ Tᵉ Hᵉ =
    is-right-ideal-generated-by-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ
      ( right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Tᵉ)
      ( transitive-leq-subtypeᵉ Sᵉ Tᵉ
        ( subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Tᵉ)
        ( contains-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Tᵉ)
        ( Hᵉ))

  right-ideal-subset-hom-large-poset-Ringᵉ :
    hom-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( λ l2ᵉ → l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ)
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Aᵉ))
      ( right-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Aᵉ)
  map-hom-Large-Preorderᵉ right-ideal-subset-hom-large-poset-Ringᵉ =
    right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
  preserves-order-hom-Large-Preorderᵉ right-ideal-subset-hom-large-poset-Ringᵉ =
    preserves-order-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
```

#### The Galois connection `S ↦ (S)`

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ : Level} (Aᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ)
  where

  adjoint-relation-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    {l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Sᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Aᵉ) (Iᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Aᵉ) →
    leq-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ (right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ) Iᵉ ↔ᵉ
    (Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ)
  pr1ᵉ (adjoint-relation-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Sᵉ Iᵉ) Hᵉ =
    transitive-leq-subtypeᵉ Sᵉ
      ( subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ)
      ( subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ)
      ( Hᵉ)
      ( contains-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ)
  pr2ᵉ (adjoint-relation-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Sᵉ Iᵉ) =
    is-right-ideal-generated-by-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ Iᵉ

  right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ :
    galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( l1ᵉ ⊔ᵉ_) (λ lᵉ → lᵉ)
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Aᵉ))
      ( right-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Aᵉ)
  lower-adjoint-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
    right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ =
    right-ideal-subset-hom-large-poset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
  upper-adjoint-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
    right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ =
    subset-right-ideal-hom-large-poset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
  adjoint-relation-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
    right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ =
    adjoint-relation-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
```

#### The reflective Galois connection `S ↦ (S)`

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ : Level} (Aᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ)
  where

  forward-inclusion-is-reflective-right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ :
    {l2ᵉ : Level} (Iᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Aᵉ) →
    leq-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
      ( right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ (subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ))
      ( Iᵉ)
  forward-inclusion-is-reflective-right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ =
    is-right-ideal-generated-by-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
      ( subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ)
      ( Iᵉ)
      ( refl-leq-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ)

  backward-inclusion-is-reflective-right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ :
    {l2ᵉ : Level} (Iᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Aᵉ) →
    leq-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ
      ( right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ (subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ))
  backward-inclusion-is-reflective-right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ =
    contains-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Aᵉ (subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ)

  is-reflective-right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ :
    is-reflective-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Aᵉ))
      ( right-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Aᵉ)
      ( right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Aᵉ)
  pr1ᵉ (is-reflective-right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ) =
    forward-inclusion-is-reflective-right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ
  pr2ᵉ (is-reflective-right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ) =
    backward-inclusion-is-reflective-right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Iᵉ

  right-ideal-subset-reflective-galois-connection-Ringᵉ :
    reflective-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Aᵉ))
      ( right-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Aᵉ)
  galois-connection-reflective-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
    right-ideal-subset-reflective-galois-connection-Ringᵉ =
    right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
  is-reflective-reflective-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
    right-ideal-subset-reflective-galois-connection-Ringᵉ =
    is-reflective-right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ
```

### The right ideal generated by a family of subsets of a ring

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) {Uᵉ : UUᵉ l2ᵉ} (Sᵉ : Uᵉ → subset-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ)
  where

  generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ :
    subset-Ringᵉ (l2ᵉ ⊔ l3ᵉ) Rᵉ
  generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ xᵉ =
    union-family-of-subtypesᵉ Sᵉ xᵉ

  right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ ⊔ l3ᵉ) Rᵉ
  right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ =
    right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ

  subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ ⊔ l3ᵉ) Rᵉ
  subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ =
    subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ

  is-in-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ → UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ ⊔ l3ᵉ)
  is-in-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ =
    is-in-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ

  contains-subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ :
    {αᵉ : Uᵉ} → (Sᵉ αᵉ) ⊆ᵉ subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ
  contains-subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ {αᵉ} xᵉ Hᵉ =
    contains-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ)
      ( xᵉ)
      ( unit-trunc-Propᵉ (αᵉ ,ᵉ Hᵉ))

  is-right-ideal-generated-by-family-of-subsets-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ :
    is-right-ideal-generated-by-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ
      ( right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ)
      ( λ αᵉ → contains-subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ)
  is-right-ideal-generated-by-family-of-subsets-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ
    Jᵉ Hᵉ =
    is-right-ideal-generated-by-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-subsets-Ringᵉ)
      ( Jᵉ)
      ( λ yᵉ qᵉ →
        apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ qᵉ
          ( subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ yᵉ)
          ( λ (αᵉ ,ᵉ Kᵉ) → Hᵉ αᵉ yᵉ Kᵉ))
```

### The right ideal generated by a family of elements in a ring

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) {Iᵉ : UUᵉ l1ᵉ} (aᵉ : Iᵉ → type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
  where

  generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l1ᵉ Rᵉ
  generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ xᵉ =
    trunc-Propᵉ (fiberᵉ aᵉ xᵉ)

  right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ l1ᵉ Rᵉ
  right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ =
    right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ

  subset-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l1ᵉ Rᵉ
  subset-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ =
    subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ

  is-in-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ : type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ → UUᵉ l1ᵉ
  is-in-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ =
    is-in-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ

  contains-element-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ :
    (iᵉ : Iᵉ) → is-in-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ (aᵉ iᵉ)
  contains-element-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ iᵉ =
    contains-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ)
      ( aᵉ iᵉ)
      ( unit-trunc-Propᵉ (iᵉ ,ᵉ reflᵉ))

  abstract
    is-right-ideal-generated-by-family-of-elements-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ :
      is-right-ideal-generated-by-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ Rᵉ aᵉ
        right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ
        contains-element-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ
    is-right-ideal-generated-by-family-of-elements-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ
      Jᵉ Hᵉ =
      is-right-ideal-generated-by-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
        ( generating-subset-right-ideal-family-of-elements-Ringᵉ)
        ( Jᵉ)
        ( λ xᵉ pᵉ →
          apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ pᵉ
            ( subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ xᵉ)
            ( λ where (iᵉ ,ᵉ reflᵉ) → Hᵉ iᵉ))
```

## Properties

### The right ideal generated by the underlying subset of an right ideal `I` is `I` itself

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) (Iᵉ : right-ideal-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Rᵉ)
  where

  cases-forward-inclusion-idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    (lᵉ : right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ)) →
    is-in-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ
      ( ev-right-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ)
      ( lᵉ))
  cases-forward-inclusion-idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ nilᵉ =
    contains-zero-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ
  cases-forward-inclusion-idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
    ( consᵉ ((xᵉ ,ᵉ uᵉ) ,ᵉ yᵉ) lᵉ) =
    is-closed-under-addition-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ
      ( is-closed-under-right-multiplication-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ xᵉ yᵉ uᵉ)
      ( cases-forward-inclusion-idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ lᵉ)

  abstract
    forward-inclusion-idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
      leq-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
        ( right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ))
        ( Iᵉ)
    forward-inclusion-idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ Hᵉ =
      apply-universal-property-trunc-Propᵉ Hᵉ
        ( subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ xᵉ)
        ( λ where
          ( lᵉ ,ᵉ reflᵉ) →
            cases-forward-inclusion-idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ lᵉ)

  backward-inclusion-idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    leq-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( Iᵉ)
      ( right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ))
  backward-inclusion-idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ =
    contains-subset-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ)

  idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    has-same-elements-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (subset-right-ideal-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ))
      ( Iᵉ)
  pr1ᵉ (idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ) =
    forward-inclusion-idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ
  pr2ᵉ (idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ) =
    backward-inclusion-idempotent-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ xᵉ
```

### The operation `S ↦ (S)` preserves least upper bounds

Inᵉ
[`ring-theory.joins-right-ideals-rings`](ring-theory.joins-right-ideals-rings.mdᵉ)
weᵉ willᵉ convertᵉ thisᵉ factᵉ to theᵉ factᵉ thatᵉ `Sᵉ ↦ᵉ (S)`ᵉ preservesᵉ joins.ᵉ

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) {Uᵉ : UUᵉ l2ᵉ} (Sᵉ : Uᵉ → subset-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ)
  where

  preserves-least-upper-bounds-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ :
    {l4ᵉ : Level} (Tᵉ : subset-Ringᵉ l4ᵉ Rᵉ) →
    is-least-upper-bound-family-of-elements-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ))
      ( Sᵉ)
      ( Tᵉ) →
    is-least-upper-bound-family-of-elements-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( right-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( λ αᵉ → right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ (Sᵉ αᵉ))
      ( right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Tᵉ)
  preserves-least-upper-bounds-right-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ =
    preserves-join-lower-adjoint-galois-connection-Large-Posetᵉ
      ( powerset-Large-Posetᵉ (type-Ringᵉ Rᵉ))
      ( right-ideal-Ring-Large-Posetᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( right-ideal-subset-galois-connection-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)
```
